channel.title: How do i set my javec path... im getting erros in compile.bat!
channel.description:
When i run my compile.bat in testscape source i keep getting these errors... [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img82.imageshack.us/img82/231/javecel7.png[/img][/URL] This is what it says when you click edit...
@echo off title TestScape Compiler javac *.java pause
Do i have to set my javec path, if so how and if not can you please explain it to me :confused: Thanks, [glow=red,2,300] Offy[/glow] :|

@offy wrote:

it says that it is a private video and i need to accept the senders request to view it… one problem - i dont have a request lol :eek: if you need my email address, pm me and ill tell you

item.title: How do i set my javec path... im getting erros in compile.bat!
item.dc:creator: @offy offy
item.description:
@offy wrote:

It doesn’t seem to work… I pt all my files into it but i still got the same ‘error’ which is shown on the above picture.

It may sound pretty nooby but can you explain in more detail (e.g. what files to put in the bin). If there is a tut please post the link.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set my javec path... im getting erros in compile.bat!

item.title: How do i set my javec path... im getting erros in compile.bat!
item.dc:creator: @catharsis catharsis
item.description:
@catharsis wrote:

put all ur files in the most updated jdk bin

open up your folder with source and run and all that in it.
select them all
ctrl + A
then
ctrl + C
now go
start
my computer
local disk (C:)
programme files
java
then find your most recent jdk folder
open it
open bin
paste the files you previously selected in there.

now your ready, compile, run.

if not then post here

Read full topic
